item.description: Price: (as of – Details) COMPLETE SHOOTING TARGETS GAME KIT: The Astroshot Zero GX multi player target shooting game set includes 1 target shooting gallery, 1 foam dart gun toy, 12 soft foam darts, 1 dart clip, 10 floating ball targets, and 5 knock down targetsFLOATING BALL TARGET PRACTICE FOR KIDS: Load each toy gun ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $28.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:36:26 UTC – Details)



COMPLETE SHOOTING TARGETS GAME KIT: The Astroshot Zero GX multi player target shooting game set includes 1 target shooting gallery, 1 foam dart gun toy, 12 soft foam darts, 1 dart clip, 10 floating ball targets, and 5 knock down targets
FLOATING BALL TARGET PRACTICE FOR KIDS: Load each toy gun with 1 soft foam dart at a time, cock, aim, and knockdown all gun targets from up to a 20ft shooting range; these toy guns are compatible with Nerf guns, targets, and accessories
2 WAYS TO PLAY: Flip the switch on the module to activate the floating ball shooting game targets or install the flip targets; switch on the galactic soundtrack or not and play with family and friends
DURABLE INDOOR TOY SPECS: The target practice shooting gallery features glow in the dark pieces, 2 leg supports for stability, measures 13.5” W x 9.5” H, and requires (4) C batteries (not included); these indoor target games are safe for kids ages 6+
KID-SAFE AND QUALITY ASSURED: The Astroshot Zero GX is great for solo play or for playing with family and friends; We’ll provide a full refund if you’re not thrilled with these shooting target toys for boys and girls

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. item.content:encoded:
Price: $149.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:40 UTC – Details)



【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!
【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)
【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS WITH ADAPTERS】Consistently smoke test EVAP systems, Vacuum leaks, low pressure Turbo leaks, Intake Manifolds, Cooling / EGR / Exhaust Systems, worn rubber, gaskets, seals, connectors, and more! The tapered smoke injection nozzle fits into virtually all hoses and lines.
【 PRECISE AND SAFE】Engineered 100% safe for all vehicles. Thick Smoke output detects even the smallest leaks. Every unit Is backed by 1 YEAR FULL COVERAGE WARRANTY! AS AN AMERICAN FAMILY BUSINESS, we stand proudly behind our products. If you have any issues, don’t hesitate to contact us directly.
【 HOW DOES IT WORK?】(1) Fill with the included OEM Approved Smoke Fluid. The kit operates with the included OEM Approved Fluid or you may use your own USP Mineral Oil / Baby Oil. (2) Fasten the Power Cable (3) Warm up for 3 minutes and then turn on the Built-In Air Motor. (4) Check for LEAKS with Smoke Detection Technology.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

ViprTech Snowstorm (AMD) Black

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Far Cry

Grand Theft Auto V Overwatch

Insane Bootup Times

Take advantage of insanely fast bootup and loading times with the included 128GB M.2 SSD (brand/model may vary).

Built-In Gorgeous RGB Lighting

Light up your rig and showcase your internals with the ViprTech built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any true gaming PC.

Why choose us?

Affordable

Every PC is designed with affordability in mind, while preserving quality and reliability. Thus, keeping more money in your pocket.

Extensive Testing Process

Before a PC leaves our facility, it goes through a rigorous benchmarking and stress testing process, faulty or underperforming components are identified and replaced.

Made in the USA

Every one of our PCs is hand built by PC experts in the USA, providing jobs to Americans and ensuring we are able to provide the best quality systems possible.

Superior Support

We perform all technical support in-house. No more sitting on hold for hours, waiting in a call queue, or endlessly navigating through phone menu options, if you call you get a real person right away. We believe this is the only way to do it right.

System: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (3.7GHz Turbo), AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB M.2 SSD, 500GB HDD, Genuine Windows 10 Pro, RGB lighting enabled case
Showcase your internals with the built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any gaming PC and sure to make your rig stand out. Controlled via a button on the case.olled via a button on the case.
Enjoy insanely fast bootup times with the included 128GB M.2 Boot SSD, while still having plenty of storage with the 500GB secondary drive. Easily add additional storage if desired or add more DDR4 RAM (supports up to 32GB) or a dedicated GPU for even better performance
Tested to run games such as: CSGO, Far Cry, GTA V, Overwatch, DoTA 2, Rocket League, Fortnite, Minecraft, Roblox, Team Fortress 2, and many more!
Every ViprTech PC is built by hand in the USA and is stress-tested extensively before shipping. We stand behind our product and include a free 1 year warranty.

Use it as an indoor dog fence, play gate, dog play yards, or dog exercise pens. The portable playpen for dog provides 8 square feet of ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:20:34 UTC – Details)


The easy-access IRIS 24” Exercise 4-panel pet playpen with door is perfect for puppies, extra small to medium sized dogs and other family pets. Use it as an indoor dog fence, play gate, dog play yards, or dog exercise pens. The portable playpen for dog provides 8 square feet of play space for pets. Each panel of the IRIS playpen measures 33.6″ W x 24″ H, doors are 14.5” W x 16.5” H and the distance between bars is 1.7”. Built-in locks on the pet pen door twist to open for easy pet entry. The durable molded indoor pet pen will last for years. Pet pens can be positioned in different shapes to best suit your space capacity and pet’s needs. The plastic panel on the dog playpen with door securely snaps together to keep your pet inside. The panels for dog exercise pen with door also feature a non-skid rubber foot to protect flooring.

Product Description

ACTIVITY LOG NOTEPAD

These activity logs are helpful for work, home, personal and professional use. The format of this activity log allows for tracking date, starting time, and ending time. Use a single line or multiple lines to describe the appointment, task, or contact. It has a blank line at the top of each sheet to title each activity log sheet. Use one or many sheets for each project. FINALLY, a versatile activity log that can be used for many purposes and timeframes.

Page Size – 8.5″ x 11″ 50 Pages

This activity log is helpful for work, school, home and personal use . The format of this activity log include date, start, end, and appointment task or contact completion. Overall, this simple task tracker book is ideal for your time management and boost Productivity .

Activity Log Notepad focuses on meeting any of your needs . This Activity Log Notepad helps you make the most out of each day by optimizing your time and maximizing output with effective task prioritization and completion. Makes daily plan and task completing easy .

The size of this activity log notepad is 8.5×11 inches and includes 50 sheets which are large enough for your daily scheduling, and are suitable for business, office, home, and school use. You can carry on with you during the daily is a perfect gift.

To Do List Notepads, Activity Log Notepads, Weekly To Do List Notepads & Hourly Planner Notepads. Simple & Versatile Planner Pads, Made in the USA!

Activity Log Notepad. These activity logs are helpful for work, home, personal and professional use. The format of this activity log allows for tracking date, starting time, and ending time. Use a single line or multiple lines to describe the appointment, task, or contact. It has a blank line at the top of each sheet to title each activity log sheet. Use one or many sheets for each project. FINALLY, a versatile activity log that can be used for many purposes and timeframes.
Daily Activity Log. This activity log is a valuable tool for tracking time used throughout the workday. An excellent time management tool that helps understand how the day is spent. You might be interested in making your day more productive or assisting employees in making the most of their time
Client File Folder Activity Log. Log client or customer-specific activities. If your business has customers and clients, it is important to log the specific tasks you complete on their behalf or for them. Logging the time spent in that effort is also crucial. Real Estate Agents, Accountants, Lawyers, Insurance Agents, Salespeople, etc
Incoming or Outgoing Call Activity Log. Salespeople should have a daily goal of how many outgoing calls are made per day to generate business. Logging sales calls can help forecast how much effort it takes to close each sale. This activity log could also be used to track outgoing email blasts or mailings. Sales managers are wise to require these activity logs for employees to document their efforts.
Project Activity Log. In home life and at work, we are all in charge of completing projects. Stocking inventory, building a website, creating an advertisement campaign, taking photographs, packing for a trip. Each project has a series of steps that need to be completed to be successful. Log the tasks it takes to complete a project.

item.title: IRIS USA 3-Piece or 2-Piece 35 Lbs / 45 Qt WeatherPro Airtight Pet Food Storage Container Combo and Treat Box for Dog Cat Bird Food, Keep Pests Out, Translucent Body
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) IRIS plastic airtight container combo includes one 33 quart sealed storage container, two 12 quart sealed storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop and one set of wheels for your pet food storage needs. The sealed storage container features a foam seal and snaps lock latches to keep pet ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $36.99 - $31.44
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:59:37 UTC – Details)


IRIS plastic airtight container combo includes one 33 quart sealed storage container, two 12 quart sealed storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop and one set of wheels for your pet food storage needs. The sealed storage container features a foam seal and snaps lock latches to keep pet food fresh and keep pests or moisture out. Designed as pet food bins, these BPA free airtight storage bins offer many other uses as well, such as leash and toy storage, pellet storage, grain storage, birdseed storage, cat litter storage, or even as a charcoal container. The small food storage bin neatly stacks on top of the large one, and the translucent bodies allow content levels to be checked at a glance. This airtight pet food container combo is versatile, functional, and the wheels allow for easy mobility between any areas in the house. The 33QT Container Holds up to 25LBS of dry pet food and 12QT Container Holds up to 10LBS of dry pet food or treat.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.5 x 10.83 x 24.5 inches; 4.58 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 500090
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 11, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ IRIS USA, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08WH8BY8Y
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CONTENTS: 10 Lbs / 12 Qt storage container stacks on the 25 Lbs / 33 Qt storage container, one matching 2 cup food scoop, and one set of wheels. Included scoop makes measuring food easy and attachable casters make it easy to roll it from the storage area to your dog or cat bowl.
CLEAR CONTAINER BODY: The translucent body allows you to check the food level in just one glance. Quickly check the remaining amount before you head to the pet store.
DIFFERENT COLORS: Check out the different color containers to store your cute friend’s kibbles, pellets, seeds, and treats.
MADE IN USA: Produced by a Japanese company. Made in the USA. Used all around the world. BPA Free & FDA Compliant. Safe for you and your flurry friend.
DIMENSIONS: 16.50″L x 10.83″W x 18.63″H

The wheels allow for easy mobility between any areas in the house.

Product Description

american flag 5×8 outdoor: We have deep-processed the American flag fabric, which has tenacious windproof and waterproof performance. Let you become the American 5×8 flags for outside flying in all-year weather.
American flag new craft textile technology: Embroidered stars and sewing are the new precision technology adopted by the usa flag company. We have tightly embroidered stars and stitched independent stitching double stitched stripes. At the same time, each edge is stitched with two rows of lock stitches and flying on the hem. The four rows of pins improve durability, prevent tearing and avoid rapid wear and tear, and will ensure the long-lasting use of the united states flag.
Use in multiple occasions: usa flags 5×8 outdoor, you can use it on any occasion, you can tie it to the car when you travel, and take it everywhere as a souvenir. At the same time, it can be used as a flag for outdoor farms, a commemorative event for family and friends, and a flag gift on the wall of the room. The decorative American flags, and you can hang the flags on the outside windows, corridors and flagpoles in front of the door. They are all very good flags displays.
100% satisfied with the American flag: We have the most complete service system, allowing you to purchase us flag 5×8 for the first time correctly and receive a strong sense of recognition, and we provide the best quality products at the best price.
